General.Name: ADM Hamburg Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: ADM Hamburg Aktiengesellschaft does not have significant business. Previously, it was involved in the processing of oilseeds, soybeans, animal feed, and rapeseed in Germany. The company was founded in 1910 and is based in Hamburg, Germany. ADM Hamburg Aktiengesellschaft is a subsidiary of Archer-Daniels-Midland Company.

0.Name: Ms. Jaana Karola Kleinschmit von Lengefeld
0.Title: Chairwoman of the Management Board
